title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Basketball Tactical Movements Based on Video Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic basketball rules and foundational individual skills
context.additional_context: Operation centered on real-time feedback utilizing video materials optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three key movement elements by analyzing slow-motion videos demonstrating basketball tactical actions
Learners achieve over 20% higher performance accuracy at normal speed through slow-video learning when executing intermediate-to-advanced difficulty tactics
Learners autonomously select appropriate video playback speeds based on cognitive load levels and establish learning strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
